span.span: Implements an on top of a file.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是根據檔案系統中單一記錄檔的記錄順序。The is a record sequence based on a single log file in the file system. 這是 介面的簡單實作，其建構在簡單檔案記錄之上。It is a simple implementation of the interface, on top of a simple file-based log. 若要操作簡單檔案記錄，執行應用程式所使用的帳戶必須依照檔案系統安全性在建構 時的指定，取得足夠的權限。To manipulate a file-based log, the account that your application is running in must have sufficient privileges, as dictated by the file system security at the time the is constructed. 另外，在建構階段中還會要求 FullTrust 權限。In addition, a demand for FullTrust is made at construction time. 在此之後，權限驗證結果會存放在快取中，以便與 Windows 安全性模型保持一致。The permission verification results are cached thereafter in keeping with the Windows security model. 您務必要避免不小心將記錄順序內容公開給未經授權的使用者。You should ensure that you do not accidentally expose the contents of the record sequence to an unauthorized user. ## Examples 下列範例會建立記錄順序，並附加記錄到其中，最後再讀取記錄。The following example creates a record sequence, appends record to it, and finally reads the records. [!code-csharp[IRecordSequence#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/irecordsequence/cs/readrecord.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IRecordSequence#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/irecordsequence/vb/readrecord.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式 (Constructor) 會建立檔案的讀取/寫入權限，並使用共用的讀取權限開啟檔案。This constructor creates read/write access to the file, and opens the file with share Read access. 這表示，在這個 執行個體已處置之前，這個或其他處理序要開啟檔案以執行寫入的要求都會失敗，但嘗試讀取則會成功。This means that requests to open the file for writing by this or another process fails until this instance has been disposed of, but read attempts will succeed. 如果找不到 `path`，會建立 0 位元組大小的新檔案。If `path` is not found, a new file is created with a size of 0 bytes. ## Examples 下列範例會建立記錄順序、附加記錄到其中、再讀取記錄，最後處置該順序。The following example creates a record sequence, appends record to it, reads the records, and finally diposes the sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含在 `data` 參數中的資料將串連至單一位元組陣列中，以便附加成記錄。Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record. 不過，在讀取記錄時，並不會將資料分割回陣列區段。However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read. 此方法通常會在寫入記錄前完成。Normally, this method completes before the record has been written. 若要確定已寫入某筆記錄，請使用 參數指定 `recordAppendOptions` 旗標，或是呼叫 方法。To ensure that a record has been written, either specify the flag using the `recordAppendOptions` parameter, or call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立記錄順序，並附加記錄到其中，最後再讀取記錄。The following example creates a record sequence, appends record to it, and finally reads the records. remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含在 `data` 參數中的資料將串連至單一位元組陣列中，以便附加成記錄。Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record. 不過，在讀取記錄時，並不會將資料分割回陣列區段。However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read. 附加的記錄將會使用 `reservations` 參數指定的保留區，以取用先前所保留的空間。The appended record will consume space that has been previously reserved, using a reservation specified by the `reservations` parameter. 如果附加成功，則會使用可以保存資料的最小保留區域，而且該保留區域將會從集合移除。If the append succeeds, it will consume the smallest reservation area that can hold the data, and that reservation area will be removed from the collection. 此方法通常會在寫入記錄前完成。Normally, this method completes before the record has been written. 若要確定已寫入某筆記錄，請使用 參數指定 `recordAppendOptions` 旗標，或是呼叫 方法。To ensure that a record has been written, either specify the flag using the `recordAppendOptions` parameter, or call the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含在 `data` 參數中的資料將串連至單一位元組陣列中，以便附加成記錄。Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record. 不過，在讀取記錄時，並不會將資料分割回陣列區段。However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read. 附加的記錄將會使用 `reservations` 參數指定的保留區，以取用先前所保留的空間。The appended record will consume space that has been previously reserved, using a reservation specified by the `reservations` parameter. 如果附加成功，則會使用可以保存資料的最小保留區域，而且該保留區域將會從集合移除。If the append succeeds, it will consume the smallest reservation area that can hold the data, and that reservation area will be removed from the collection. 此方法通常會在寫入記錄前完成。Normally, this method completes before the record has been written. 若要確定已寫入某筆記錄，請使用 參數指定 `recordAppendOptions` 旗標，或是呼叫 方法。To ensure that a record has been written, either specify the flag using the `recordAppendOptions` parameter, or call the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該將這個方法所傳回的 傳遞給 方法，以確定附加作業已完成，而且可以適當地釋放資源。You should pass the returned by this method to the method, to ensure that the append operation has completed and resources can be freed appropriately. 如果在非同步附加期間發生錯誤，就要等到系統以這個方法傳回的 呼叫 方法時，才會擲回例外狀況。If an error has occurred during an asynchronous append, an exception is not thrown until the method is called with the returned by this method. 包含在 `data` 參數中的資料將串連至單一位元組陣列中，以便附加成記錄。Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record. 不過，在讀取記錄時，並不會將資料分割回陣列區段。However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read. 附加的記錄將會使用 `reservations` 參數指定的保留區，以取用先前所保留的空間。The appended record will consume space that has been previously reserved, using a reservation specified by the `reservations` parameter. 如果附加成功，則會使用可以保存資料的最小保留區域，而且該保留區域將會從集合移除。If the append succeeds, it will consume the smallest reservation area that can hold the data, and that reservation area will be removed from the collection. 此方法通常會在寫入記錄前完成。Normally, this method completes before the record has been written. 若要確定已寫入某筆記錄，請使用 參數指定 `recordAppendOptions` 旗標，或是呼叫 方法。To ensure that a record has been written, either specify the flag using the `recordAppendOptions` parameter, or call the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該將目前方法傳回的 傳遞給 方法，以確保清除完成，並適當釋放資源。You should pass the returned by the current method to the method to ensure that the flush completes and resources are freed appropriately. 如果在非同步清除期間發生錯誤，則必須在使用這個方法傳回的 呼叫 方法後才會擲回例外狀況。If an error occurs during an asynchronous flush, an exception is not thrown until the method is called with the returned by this method. 呼叫這個方法可以確保已永久寫入附加到 的所有記錄。Calling this method ensures that all records that have been appended to the are durably written. 如果處置了記錄順序，或是您傳遞了無效的引數，就會立即在此作業中擲回例外狀況。If a record sequence has been disposed of, or if you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately within this operation. 在非同步清除要求期間發生的錯誤 (例如，在 I/O 要求期間發生的磁碟錯誤)，會導致在呼叫 方法時擲回例外狀況。Errors that occurred during an asynchronous flush request, for example, a disk failure during the I/O request, will result in exceptions being thrown when the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該將這個方法所傳回的 傳遞給 方法，以確定重新啟動區域寫入作業已完成，而且可以適當地釋放資源。You should pass the returned by this method to the method, to assure that the restart area write operation has completed and resources can be freed appropriately. 如果在非同步重新啟動區域寫入作業期間發生錯誤，就要等到系統以這個方法傳回的 呼叫 方法時，才會擲回例外狀況。If an error has occurred during an asynchronous restart area write operation, an exception is not thrown until the method is called with the returned by this method. 包含在 `data` 參數中的資料將串連至單一位元組陣列中，以便附加成記錄。Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record. 不過，在讀取記錄時，並不會將資料分割回陣列區段。However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read. 當這個作業成功完成時，基底序號已經更新。When the operation successfully completes, the base sequence number has been updated. 只要是序號小於新基底序號的所有記錄都無法存取。All log records with sequence numbers less than the new base sequence number are inaccessible. 如果已指定 ，寫入的重新啟動區域將會使用包含在集合中的保留區，以取用先前所保留的空間。If a is specified, the written restart area will consume space that has been previously reserved, using a reservation contained in the collection. 如果此方法成功，便會取用可以保存資料的最小保留區，而且該保留區將會從集合移除。If the method succeeds, it will consume the smallest reservation that can hold the data, and that reservation will be removed from the collection. 如果處置了記錄順序，或是您傳遞了無效的引數，就會立即在此作業中擲回例外狀況。If a record sequence has been disposed of, or if you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately within this operation. 在非同步附加要求期間發生的錯誤 (例如，在 I/O 要求期間發生的磁碟錯誤) 會導致在呼叫 方法時擲回例外狀況。Errors that occurred during an asynchronous append request, for example, a disk failure during the I/O request, will result in exceptions being thrown when the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含在 `data` 參數中的資料將串連至單一位元組陣列中，以便附加成記錄。Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record. 不過，在讀取記錄時，並不會將資料分割回陣列區段。However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read. 指定的保留區會在不可部分完成的作業 (Atomic Operation) 與記錄附加作業中，加入至提供的保留區集合。The specified reservations are added to the provided reservation collection in an atomic operation with a record append operation. 如果附加失敗，就不會保留任何空間。If the append fails, no space is reserved. 這個方法通常可以在寫入記錄前完成。Normally, this method may complete before the record has been written. 若要確定已寫入某筆記錄，請使用 參數指定 `recordAppendOptions` 旗標，或是呼叫 方法。To ensure that a record has been written, either specify the flag using the `recordAppendOptions` parameter, or call the method.

summary.span: 取得最近寫入之重新啟動區域的序號。

span.span: Gets the sequence number of the most recently written restart area.

value.span: 最近寫入之重新啟動區域的序號。

span.span: The sequence number of the most recently written restart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新啟動區域可用來暫時儲存包含用戶端上一個檢查點作業的資訊。A restart area is used to temporarily store information containing a client's last checkpoint operation. 一般記錄檔系統 (CLFS) 會維護兩個重新啟動區域，以保證至少有一個有效區域永遠可供使用。The Common Log File System (CLFS) maintains two restart areas to guarantee that at least one valid area is always available. 當需要復原時，CLFS 會讀取其重新啟動區域，以及上一個檢查點作業傳回的所有資料。When a recovery is necessary, the CLFS reads its restart area and all the data from the last checkpoint operation. 這些資料會初始化異動資料表、中途分頁資料表和開啟檔案資料表，好讓它們可用於復原程序。This data initializes the transaction table, dirty pages table, and open file table so they can be used in the recovery process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新啟動區域可用來暫時儲存包含用戶端上一個檢查點作業的資訊。A restart area can be used to temporarily store information containing a client's last checkpoint operation. 當需要復原時，您可以讀取重新啟動區域，並從上一個檢查點作業擷取所有的資料。When a recovery is necessary, you can read a restart area and retrieve all the data from the last checkpoint operation. 這些資料會初始化交易資料表、中途分頁資料表和開啟檔案資料表，好讓它們可用於復原程序。This data initializes the transaction table, dirty pages table, and open file table so they can be used in the recovery process. 您可以使用 方法來讀取重新啟動區域。A restart area can be read using the method. 位元組陣列區段中的資料將串連至單一位元組陣列中，以便附加成記錄。The data in the byte array segments will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record. 在讀取重新啟動區域時，不會將資料分割回陣列區段。No provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the restart area is read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新啟動區域可用來暫時儲存包含用戶端上一個檢查點作業的資訊。A restart area can be used to temporarily store information containing a client's last checkpoint operation. 當需要復原時，您可以讀取重新啟動區域，並從上一個檢查點作業擷取所有的資料。When a recovery is necessary, you can read a restart area and retrieve all the data from the last checkpoint operation. 這些資料會初始化交易資料表、中途分頁資料表和開啟檔案資料表，好讓它們可用於復原程序。This data initializes the transaction table, dirty pages table, and open file table so they can be used in the recovery process. 您可以使用 方法來讀取重新啟動區域。A restart area can be read using the method. 當寫入重新啟動區域時，位元組陣列區段中的資料會串連至單一位元組陣列，以便附加為記錄。When a restart area is written, the data in the byte array segments are concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record. 在讀取重新啟動區域時，不會將資料分割回陣列區段。No provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the restart area is read. 當這個方法成功完成時，基底序號已經更新。When this method successfully completes, the base sequence number has been updated. 只要是序號小於新基底序號的所有記錄都無法存取。All log records with sequence numbers less than the new base sequence number are inaccessible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新啟動區域可用來暫時儲存包含用戶端上一個檢查點作業的資訊。A restart area can be used to temporarily store information containing a client's last checkpoint operation. 當需要復原時，您可以讀取重新啟動區域，並從上一個檢查點作業擷取所有的資料。When a recovery is necessary, you can read a restart area and retrieve all the data from the last checkpoint operation. 這些資料會初始化交易資料表、中途分頁資料表和開啟檔案資料表，好讓它們可用於復原程序。This data initializes the transaction table, dirty pages table, and open file table so they can be used in the recovery process. 您可以使用 方法來讀取重新啟動區域。A restart area can be read using the method. 當寫入重新啟動區域時，位元組陣列區段中的資料會串連至單一位元組陣列，以便附加為記錄。When a restart area is written, the data in the byte array segments are concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record. 在讀取重新啟動區域時，不會將資料分割回陣列區段。No provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the restart area is read. 如果已指定保留區，寫入的重新啟動區域將會使用包含在集合中的保留區，以取用先前所保留的空間。If a reservation is specified, the written restart area will consume space that has been previously reserved, using a reservation contained in the collection. 如果此方法成功，便會取用可以容納資料的最小保留區，而且該保留區將會從集合移除。If the method succeeds, it will consume the smallest reservation that can contain the data, and that reservation will be removed from the collection. 當這個方法成功完成時，基底序號已經更新。When this method successfully completes, the base sequence number has been updated. 只要是序號小於新基底序號的所有記錄都無法存取。All log records with sequence numbers less than the new base sequence number are inaccessible. 如果處置了記錄順序，或是您傳遞了無效的引數，就會立即在此作業中擲回例外狀況。If a record sequence has been disposed of, or if you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately within this operation. 在非同步附加要求期間發生的錯誤 (例如，在 I/O 要求期間發生的磁碟錯誤) 會導致在呼叫 方法時擲回例外狀況。Errors that occurred during an asynchronous append request, for example, a disk failure during the I/O request, will result in exceptions being thrown when the method is called.
